name: Casketball
description:
Casketball is a competitive local-multiplayer game in which two teams of ghosts go head to head smashing urns with a magical ball.  Teams must smash the urn of their team's color to get a point.  Players can pick up, run with, and throw not only the ball but the two urns as well.  Don't make it easy for the other team to smash their Urn!

The Team:

William Pyle: Game designer, Programmer, Project Manager

Tyler Mathai: Asset Artist

PK Kim: Composer

Soundtrack:

smallywog.bandcamp.com/album/casketball-official-soundtrack

MAC BUILD IS ON THE WAY!
